title: Fukuoka Central City Retreat near Entertainment District
description: ANA Crowne Plaza Fukuoka, an IHG Hotel, is an urban escape located in the heart of the bustling harbour city of Fukuoka. Dine on traditional cuisine at Chikushino restaurant, savour a cocktail at the Mezzanine Bar or nab a tasty treat from Trois patisserie. When Fukuoka tempts you to explore, indulge in a shopping spree at Canal City shopping mall or venture out to the neon-lit Nakasu entertainment district to experience steaming street foods and lively izakayas.
location_description: ANA Crowne Plaza Fukuoka, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 3-3-3, Hakataeki Mae, Hakata-ku Fukuoka-shi, Fukuoka, 812-0011, Japan
